member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItemSink.InitMenu
member.summary: Called to allow a system language bar item extension to add items to a system language bar menu.
member.param: Pointer to an interface that the system language bar item uses to add items to the system language bar menu.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItemSink.OnMenuSelect
member.summary: Called when the user selects an item in the system menu added by the system language bar menu extension.
member.param: Specifies the identifier of the menu item selected. This is the value passed for uId in .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfSystemLangBarItemSink
member.summary: The ITfSystemLangBarItemSink interface is implemented by a system language bar menu extension and used by a system language bar menu (host) to allow menu items to be added to an existing system language bar menu. The extension obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the object with IID_ITfSystemLangBarItemSink. It can then pass the object to the host by calling .
